JobPortal Api Documentation

Api Endpoints

Api Root

1. Company app:

  • * api/companies -> get companies listing Test
  • * api/companies/search?query=search_query -> search company Test
  • * api/companies/pk -> Company details and informations Test
  • * api/companies/pk/jobs -> Companies Jobs listing Test

2. Jobs app:

  • * api/jobs -> Jobs listing
  • * api/jobs/search?query=search_query -> search and filter Test
  • * api/jobs/job_id -> get job details | Job's 'CRUD' if authenticated
